snippet.title: The Thaumaturge | Quest Trailer
snippet.description:
📕 Wishlist #TheThaumaturge: http://re.11bits.com/x48 

We invite players to step into the gritty streets of 1905 Warsaw our upcoming isometric RPG, The Thaumaturge. Taking center stage as our thaumaturge, Wiktor Szulski is the kind of guy who won't think twice about diving into the darkest corners of the city to investigate and stand up against the Russian Okhrana who controls its streets. In this quest trailer—using his thaumaturgy powers and the might of his otherworldly salutors to lend a helping hand—Wiktor will aid a damsel in distress who is in crucial need of assistance.

The Thaumaturge is a story-driven RPG with morally ambiguous choices, taking place in the culturally diverse world of early 20th-century Warsaw.
